meanings.sent1: I dezincs the metal to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: The worker dezincs the metal before shaping it.
meanings.sent3: Why did the metal refuse to dezincs? It wanted to keep its shine!
meanings.sent4: The process of dezincsing the metal felt like uncovering hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: With each dezincing, the metal revealed its true beauty.

meanings.definition: The process of removing zinc from a metal
meanings.sent1: After the dezincs, the metal was ready for the next step.
meanings.sent2: The dezincs of the metal required precision and care.
meanings.sent3: The dezincs of the metal seemed like a magical transformation.
meanings.sent4: The dezincs of the metal was like peeling away layers to reveal its core.
meanings.sent5: The dezincs of the metal left it pure and ready for new possibilities.
